name: @abstractplay/zendo
description: A peer-to-peer, synchronous client for playing Zendo online
author: Aaron Dalton <aaron@daltons.ca> (https://www.perlkonig.com)

scripts.dev: set NODE_ENV=development && npm run schemas && vite
scripts.build: set NODE_ENV=production && npm run schemas && vite build
scripts.preview: set NODE_ENV=development && npm run build && vite preview
scripts.schemas: npx json2ts -i src/schemas/messages.json -o src/schemas/messages.d.ts && npx json2ts -i src/schemas/game.json -o src/schemas/game.d.ts
